discourse_list.title: Let the world know that MakerDao is the best!

content.content: At the moment MakerDao is the best “lending platform” out there. You can get a loan with Ethereum as collateral at 0.00% interest, and with Bitcoin at 1.00%. Competition doesn’t even come close: 4.50% - BlockFi; 11.90% - Nexo (5.90% if paid with their token); 6.26% - Celsius; 5.95% - Salt Lending. However, even considering that those who borrow through these platforms pay immensely more interest than with a loan on MakerDao, those platforms “claim” to have originated loan volumes dozens of times larger than MakerDao. The difference between MakerDao and these others is not only the interest rate, but the awareness of the existence of the platform. Those private companies spend hundreds of thousands of dollars each month on marketing, and even considering that they have a worse product, they manage to have a critical mass of users. So I think that MakerDao should establish a long-term budget for marketing. There are many people who would use a loan with DAI, however, the technical barrier prevents it. So the creation of step-by-step guides could facilitate the entry of new users.  There are some services that I am aware of that sell marketing packages: https://cryptocoin.news/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/29m-PR-Marketing-Package-4.95k-1.pdf https://bitcoinprbuzz.com/services/ NOTE: I am not affiliated with them, and I have no interest in promoting them (it’s just to give an idea of what’s available).  Furthermore, there are many problems that would be solved through the increase of users, for example the PEG would be a minor problem if the DAI supply were 1 Billion instead of the only 100M, this because there would be much more liquidity on the system and the creation/redemption of a single CDP would have less impact.
